title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about Europe’s pharma supply chain, stopping GLP-1 drugs, and more
description: Many patients using GLP-1 drugs like Wegovy may not regain lost weight quickly when they stop treatment, an analysis of real-world data shows
content: Many patients using GLP-1 drugs like Wegovy may not regain lost weight quickly when they stop treatment, an analysis of real-world data shows
